port_id.description:
Unique identifier for specified port. (For NEVI or other Part 680 project, 
port_id must be same as the permanent station identifier provided
to third parties pursuant to CFR 23 § 680.116(c)(8)(iii).)

project_id.description:
Unique identification code specific to individual funding application or contract.
Project ID is supplied by administrator upon approval of funding.

station_id.description:
Unique identifier for the station where specific port is located.
(For NEVI or other Part 680 project, station_id must be same as
the permanent station identifier provided to third parties pursuant
to CFR 23 § 680.116(c)(1)).

data_provider_poc_email.description: Email address for data provider point of contact.

power_level_kw.description: Maximum charging power level of the port (in kW)

port_latitude.description:
Port WSG84-encoded longitude in decimal degrees to at least 4 decimal places.
Valid longitudes are between -180 and 180

port_longitude.description:
Port WSG84 encoded latitude in decimal degrees to at least 4 decimal places.
Valid latitudes are between -90 and 90.

station_activation_date.description:
The first (full or partial) day where the station is fully operable
and accessible for its intended purpose

connector_type.description: Valid Connector Type. Multiple connector types should be separated by commas.

energy_fee.description: Fee charged to user per kWh (in USD).

session_fee.description: Fee charged to user per session (in USD).

time_fee.description: Fee charged to users per minute (in USD).

parking_fee.description: Fee charged for parking if separate from time_fee (in USD).

idle_fee.description: Fee charged for minutes not charging if separate from time fee (in USD).

operating_hours.description:
Number of hours station is open per day—e.g., a station that is always open
has a value of 24 whereas a station that is open from 6 am to 6 pm has a value of 12.

equipment_manufacturer.description: Charging equipment or system manufacturer name.

model_number.description: Charging equipment or system model number.

equipment_serial.description: serial number of charging equipment or system.

data_provider_poc_last.description: Last name of the data provider point of contact.

data_provider_poc_first.description: First name of the data provider point of contact.

network_contact.description: Email address for network service provider.

trailer_accessible.description: Port located on pull through stall that can accommodate a vehicle and trailer
